texts.desc: [A man in a suit enters the room you and Kelly are working in.]
The Man: "Kelly, good to see you. This must be your new...coworker...guess the last didn't work out?"
Kelly: "You know me. I'm a tough boss. I'll give you the info about him later...he claims to be a pro. Interoggator, This is Mark, the director of the interrogation branch."

choices.text: [You are shaking your leg and chewing on a pencil like a child.] *Tommy Wiseau voice* "Oh hi Mark!....what's up dude?"
[You stand up to shake his hand.] "Pleasure to meet you."

texts.desc: [He stares bewildered at you.] Mark: "Uh...hello.....Kelly, I need your help."
Kelly: "Let me guess...you caught a big one?"
Mark: "Yep. And he won't talk. You got any recommendations? [Kelly somewhat reluctantly looks at you.]"

choices.text: [Twirl your pencil around and stare at the ceiling]

texts.desc: [He shakes your hand.] Mark: "Likewise. Kelly, we have an urgent situation."
Kelly: "Let me guess...you caught a big one?"
Mark: "Yep. And he won't talk. You got any recommendations? [Kelly turns to you with a slightly confident smirk.]"

choices.text: [You try to look confident.] "I could handle this."

texts.desc: Kelly: "And this is why I hired him."
Mark: "Fantastic! We will roll him out now. Meet you all in the interrogation room. Good luck, interrogator.
Kelly: "It was good to volunteer...let's go." [You both head the the interrogation room.]
Mark: "Great! We will roll him out now. Meet you all in the interrogation room.
Kelly: "Next time, speak up." [You both head the the interrogation room.]
Kelly: "Uh, no, my interrogator WILL do it."
Mark: "If you say so....we will roll him out now. Meet you all in the interrogation room.
Kelly: "You idiot...come on. Do your job." [You both head the the interrogation room.]
